question: Which actor starred in Good Will Hunting and attended Harvard?
intermediate_logs:
Which actor starred in Good Will Hunting and attended Harvard?

Thought: First, I need to find more information about Good Will Hunting.

Action:WikiSearch

Action Input: Good Will Hunting

Observation:Thought: First, I need to find more information about Good Will Hunting.

Action:WikiSearch

Action Input: Good Will Hunting


Observation: Page: Good Will Hunting
Summary: Good Will Hunting is a 1997 American drama film directed by Gus Van Sant and starring Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Minnie Driver, and Stellan Skarsgård. The film follows 20-year-old South Boston janitor Will Hunting, an unrecognized genius who, as part of a deferred prosecution agreement after assaulting a police officer, becomes a client of a therapist and studies advanced mathematics with a renowned professor. The screenplay was written by Damon and Affleck.

Thought: The movie Good Will Hunting starred Matt Damon and Ben Affleck, among others. Now, I need to find out which of these actors attended Harvard.

Action:WikiSearch

Action Input: Matt Damon

Observation: Page: Good Will Hunting
Summary: Good Will Hunting is a 1997 American drama film directed by Gus Van Sant and starring Robin Williams, Matt Damon, Ben Affleck, Minnie Driver, and Stellan Skarsgård. The film follows 20-year-old South Boston janitor Will Hunting, an unrecognized genius who, as part of a deferred prosecution agreement after assaulting a police officer, becomes a client of a therapist and studies advanced mathematics with a renowned professor. The screenplay was written by Damon and Affleck.

Thought: The movie Good Will Hunting starred Matt Damon and Ben Affleck, among others. Now, I need to find out which of these actors attended Harvard.

Action:WikiSearch

Action Input: Matt Damon


Observation: Page: Matt Damon
Summary: Matthew Paige Damon is an American actor, film producer, and screenwriter. He is ranked among Forbes magazine's most bankable stars and is one of the highest-grossing actors of all time. Damon has received various accolades, including an Academy Award, from five nominations, two Golden Globe Awards, from eight nominations, and has been nominated for three British Academy Film Awards and six Emmy Awards. He attended Harvard University, where he wrote an early treatment of the screenplay for Good Will Hunting as an assignment for an English class.
